CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 20, 1957, pg. A9 reads: "Cotton Queen" - Charming Phyllis Ball, sweetheart of Omicron Chapter of Alpha Phi Alpha, was crowned the 1957 "Queen of Cotton" by Arnold Sowell, track star at the university of Pittsburgh. The dance, given by Iota Chapter of Alpha Kappa Alpha, was held at the Hotel Fort Pitt.  The AKAs will also present the Cotillion, May 18. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of five women, including Rachel Barren on left, "Queen of Cotton" Phyllis Ball, and Jean Wilson on right, standing in Fort Pitt Hotel for Alpha Kappa Alpha dance
